channel.title: Change Default Hit Splatters?
channel.description:
I don't imagine it being too difficult, but on my client there are no sprites for hit splatters, but there are the default RS hit splatters. Same issue with the HP Bars, since it's just an image is there anything technical I'd have to do?
I DID find a guide https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=516825.0
But I am unsure if that's adding hitsplatters from scratch? Help please
